announcement.text:
https://github.com/bmos/FG-PFRPG-Disease-Tracker
PFRPG Disease Tracker v1.3.0:
This extension helps track disease duration, saves, effects, and other information. To access it, click the pill bottle button next by the character's hitpoints.
To have saving throws rolled automatically based on the in-game clock, you must be using the Clock Adjuster extension.
